function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Multifaceted public health interventions","Impact":"Effective control and mitigation of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of interventions based on transmission patterns","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling for predicting transmission","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government","Owner":"Health authorities, government, research institutions"},{"Description":"Closure of schools, bars, and restaurants","Impact":"Disruption of social and economic activities","Mitigation":"Support for affected businesses and remote learning for students","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, financial support systems","People":"Students, business owners, employees","Owner":"Government, education institutions, employers"},{"Description":"Non-consideration of travel bans and enhanced testing","Impact":"Missed opportunities for early detection and containment of the virus","Mitigation":"Implementation of comprehensive testing and quarantine measures","Technologies":"Testing kits, contact tracing apps, quarantine monitoring systems","People":"General public, travelers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities, government, transportation authorities"}]}
